title: 335. Does Doing Good Give You License to Be Bad?
description: Corporate Social Responsibility programs can attract better job applicants who'll work for less money. But they also encourage employees to misbehave. Don't laugh — you too probably engage in “moral licensing,” even if you don't know it.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
